Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IEffect, Eamon, Version=1.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are walking in the woods looking for prey, when you are suddenly shrouded in a cloud of white smoke. The smoke is too dense to see through, but eventually the smoke clears and you find yourself on a barren plain.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you turn around, you see an old witch stand before you. "Listen carefully!" the witch whispers with a hoarse voice.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "I have summoned you here to help me clear this land from the evil mountain king, who lives in his castle up north. The mountain king terrorizes this land, and must die so that peace can be restored around here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "If you succeed you will be significantly rewarded.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "You will meet various of his evil guardians on your quest, so take care. Unfortunately I could not bring you here with your weapons and armor, so you will have to make do with what you find around here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Good luck!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: With those words, the witch disappears in a puff of white smoke.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You press the button. The lamp comes to life and starts rotating clockwise briefly. Then it stops. The beam of light is now shining south over the beautiful ocean.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You press the button. The lamp comes to life and starts rotating clockwise briefly. Then it stops. The beam of light is now shining southwest over the beautiful ocean.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You press the button. The lamp comes to life and starts rotating clockwise briefly. Then it stops. The beam of light is now shining on the cliffs to the west.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You press the button. The lamp comes to life and starts rotating clockwise briefly. Then it stops. The beam of light is now shining northwest into the forest.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You press the button. The lamp comes to life and starts rotating clockwise briefly. Then it stops. The beam of light is now shining directly north onto the bridge crossing the ravine.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You press the button. The lamp comes to life and starts rotating clockwise briefly. Then it stops. The beam of light is now shining to the northeast where a huge tree is standing.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You press the button. The lamp comes to life and starts rotating clockwise briefly. Then it stops. The beam of light is now shining directly east hitting the sea somewhere east of the beach.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You press the button. The lamp comes to life and starts rotating clockwise briefly. Then it stops. The beam of light is now shining southeast over the beautiful ocean.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You say hello to Lisa. She begins to speak: "I had foreseen that you would come here. However, I have not seen whether you will succeed in your quest, but I believe you have the potential. Perhaps we can help each other."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: She continues, "I believe you are the only one who can help me. I need to know what happened to my friend Damian. I haven't seen him in a long time. If you can help me, I will reward you! I may also know a thing or two about things around here. Just ask."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: [to ask Lisa a question, "SAY <topic>", e.g. "SAY FOREST"]

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You say hi to Lisa. She begins to speak: "I had foreseen that you would come here. However, I have not seen whether you will succeed in your quest, but I believe you have the potential. Perhaps we can help each other."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You approach the handle, but as you do so, a horrible swamp monster materializes in front of you!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The swamp monster is between you and the handle!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You take a good grip of the handle and pull it out of the mud. You are now holding a sword, but it is covered in mud, so you wipe it clean. To your amazement you realize that it is a sharp silver sword!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: If you want the handle you must GET the HANDLE.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The young man is obviously dead. Around his neck you find a necklace, which you take.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This time you find nothing.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The werewolf gets a serious wound.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: But what is happening? The wound seems to heal itself! Perhaps the werewolf is immune to normal weapons...

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The werewolf howls in pain. It seems as if a fire is burning inside the wound!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You can't SAVE with unfriendlies about!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You hand the necklace to the woman and her eyes open wide.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "You found it! You found Damian's necklace!" she exclaims. "Where did you find it?"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You tell her that you found it around the neck of the man who appeared after you killed the werewolf.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Her eyes go sad. "That means he had become a werewolf. What a horrible destiny..." A tear runs down her cheek. "But I am happy you put an end to his misery." she says.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "I want to thank you, but the only thing I can do for you is cast a spell on you, which will increase your hardiness. The spell will wear off in a couple of days, though."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You agree and the woman waves her hand at you while she mumbles some strange words. You suddenly feel stronger!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You can feel absolutely no magic in the air, but you try to cast the Blast Spell anyway. As expected nothing happens.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You can feel absolutely no magic in the air, but you try to cast the Heal Spell anyway. As expected nothing happens.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You can feel absolutely no magic in the air, but you try to cast the Power Spell anyway. As expected nothing happens.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You can feel absolutely no magic in the air, but you try to cast the Speed Spell anyway. As expected nothing happens.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "You may also find that your abilities have changed. But don't worry - once you return to Eamon everything will be as it used to.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: After the fight you stay around and relax until your wounds are healed.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It seems as if your last blow was too much for the giant bat. It collapses to the ground, dead as a doornail.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It seems as though victory is finally yours. The mountain king stumbles backwards and falls onto his throne, dead. You hardly can believe it - you have defeated the mighty mountain king!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You sit down for a moment to recover. Suddenly you hear a faint whistling sound and the dust on the floor begins whirling around in the room. There is a puff and once again the witch, which brought you to this world, stands before you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Well done!" the witch says. "I wasn't sure that you would succeed but you were our only hope. Now that you have succeeded, I owe you a reward.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "The reward, if you want it, is to reign this land - to be the new king. You will be rich and powerful. However, do not abuse your power, because if you do, I will send a new warrior to go looking for you."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You accept the reward and start your new life as king of the mountains, where you reign for the rest of your life. But you never forget the words of the witch: "...do not abuse your power...." and so you make sure that you rule with justice.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Then, at the end of your life, you are lying on your deathbed. You have just passed on the crown to a young friend of yours when you become unconscious. Then in a vision the witch appears before you once again:

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "You have served us well," the witch says. "I will now bring you back to Eamon where you are still young. In addition I give you this valuable diamond as a token of our gratitude."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Darkness envelopes you...

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Lisa falls to the ground dead. Was that really necessary?

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It seems as if your last blow was too much for the ogre. The ogre pauses for a second, then it falls over the railing and into the ravine. Finally you can cross the bridge.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It seems as if the fight is over. The warrior falls to his knees, then he goes over the edge of the platform, landing on the ground far below a few seconds later with a big thud.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Your last blow was too much for the monster, and so it falls over, stone dead.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It seems as if your last blow was too much for the werewolf, since it falls over and lies still. You decide to stay here until you are fully recovered from your wounds.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It seems as if your last blow was too much for the giant squid, so it collapses in front of you, dropping the shield it was holding. The waves drag the body of the giant squid out to sea.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You wake up outside the Main Hall young and well. You get to your feet and enter.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: In this land there is no reason to flee. Your enemies would just follow you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Giving your gold away isn't going to help you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Any news of Damian yet?" Lisa asks while she gives you a hopeful glance. "I guess not..." she mumbles to herself.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Hello my friend," Lisa says. "Good luck with your mission."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about her friend Damian. She answers: "We have been friends for a very long time. I once gave him a gold necklace with a locket containing a hair. If you can find this necklace, you are on the right track."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about her friend Damian. She answers: "We have been friends for a very long time. I will never forget him..." Once again a tear runs down her cheek.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about the gold necklace. she answers: "The gold necklace holds a locket containing a hair."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about bats. She says, "The giant bats might be dangerous but for an experienced adventurer as you it isn't going to be a problem. In fact, it may be the easiest enemy you will encounter in this land."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about the cave. She replies, "I don't know what is in there, but I have seen that a giant bat is guarding the entrance. I think the cave is used for some kind of ceremony at night."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about the lighthouse. She replies, "It is used to help the ships find their way to the beach. However, I have seen that the light from the lighthouse sometimes points at the opening in the western cliffs at night."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about the opening in the western cliffs. She replies, "All I know is that an opening can be seen in the western cliffs. It can be seen from the top of the lighthouse."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about squids. She replies, "Squids may be slightly tougher than bats but that's about it. You shouldn't have big problems defeating a squid."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about the warrior. She replies, "Rumor has it that he excels in unarmed combat. You should definitely gain some good weapons before you approach him."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about the large oak tree. She replies, "It should be possible to go up into the big oak tree, since there is a big platform up there. I think if you examine the oak carefully, you will find a way up."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about herself. She replies, "Me? I have lived here all my life. It was a nice place until the arrival of the mountain king..."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about the swamp. She replies, "The swamp is a dangerous place. There are monsters hiding in the swamp. Don't go there unless you have a very good reason!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about monsters. Lisa replies, "The swamp monsters are tough enemies, even for an experienced adventurer as you. Make sure you have at least a sharp weapon and some protection before you try to kill a monster!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about werewolves. She replies, "Rumor has it, that there is a werewolf in the forest west of the bridge. A werewolf can only be killed by weapons made of silver."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about ogres. She replies, "Ever since the arrival of the mountain king, the bridge has been guarded by an ogre. It is a very tough enemy! You should be perfectly prepared before you try to fight it."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about the mountain king. She replies, "The mountain king terrorizes this land with his awful dangerous servants and he keeps this island separated from the main land beyond the bridge. Unfortunately, he will be very difficult to defeat."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about the Mountain King's servants. She replies, "You will encounter many different enemies in this land, such as bats, monsters, ogres, squids and werewolves. You may also encounter the aggressive warrior who lives around here."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Lisa replies, "Sorry, I don't know anything about that."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about this land. She replies, "This land used to be a nice place until the mountain king came along. If you can defeat him, you will make a lot of people happy."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about the reward. She replies, "You will know about the reward soon enough."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about the mountains. She replies, "My family and friends live in the mountain area up north. Unfortunately the mountain king keeps this island separated from the main land, so I cannot visit them anymore."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about the forest. She replies, "According to rumors, there are werewolves in the forest. So don't go there without a silver weapon!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You ask Lisa about hair in the locket. She replies, "There is nothing magical about it. It is just some of my hair so that Damian had a memory of me."

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
